page.title: 05THE GAMEKEEPERS YEAR CONT.
page.content: ground and peat hags till they are within range. The stag is then hopefully shot cleanly with a high -powered rifle and {gralloched}before it becomes gassy.(The viscera is removed). A good stag this year is worth about Â£130. Fifty to seventy stags will be shot by 12th October.{October}is also the month for the{lamb sales}in{Perth}and Mr Reid sends his there. Later he will have twelve or fourteen days{pheasant shooting}and will spend one or two days helping out at Kindrochet also shooting pheasants. During{November}and{December seventy hinds will be shot. Otherwise they would die of{starvation}during the winter months. During bad weather Mr Reid has to
